notes: Very clean, modern apartment with new fixtures, light wood cabinetry, induction cooktop, built-in oven, microwave, and AC. Floor is polished tile throughout with no stairs visible, making it baby-safe; no balcony shown in images. Natural light appears limited based on photos but the space is bright with recessed lighting. Building appears to be a newer high-rise marketed to expats (Elegant Realty watermark), and being on 10F of 15F strongly suggests elevator access.
